text: The Vidarbha women's cricket team is an Indian domestic cricket team representing the Vidarbha region of Maharashtra. The team has represented the state in Senior women’s one day league (List A) and Senior women's T20 league. ==References== Category:2006 establishments in India Category:Cricket in Maharashtra Category:Cricket in Vidarbha Category:Sport in Nagpur Category:Cricket clubs established in 2006 Category:Women's cricket teams in India
title: Vidarbha women's cricket team
